en: Oh... it's you... Have you heard what happened?
I can feel it... It's getting close...
W-What happened? What is getting close!?
fr: “Q-Quoi? Qu’est-ce qui est arriver? Qu’est-ce qui s’approche!?“

en: An ancient creature somehow escaped the seal I had placed it in many, many years ago.
fr: “Une créature ancienne s'est échappée du sceau dans lequel je l'avais placée il y a de très nombreuses années.“

en: Someone or something must be behind it, it's impossible.
fr: “Quelqu’un ou quelque chose l’a probablement fait, car c’est impossible.“

en: This creature escaped and attacked neighboring villages.
fr: “Cette créature s'est enfuie et a attaqué les villages voisins.“

en: I would put a stop to it, however, I'm getting old...
I've taught you everything I know since you were young.
But I don't think you're strong enough on your own...
You should probably go find your sisters... With their help, you might just stand a chance against it...
Before you leave on your quest to find this thing. I have a gift for you.
Here, take this. My old grimoire. It will help you along the way.
It will make your spells more powerful. It does other things too, but they will reveal themselves to you as you get stronger.
Now, off you go! Take care!
